sentence.Network_en: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

sentence.Network_en: He was strongly disinclined to believe anything that she said.
sentence.Network_cn: 她说什么他都坚决不肯相信。

sentence.Network_en: He was yoked to an disinclined partner.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不得不与一位不情愿的伙伴合作.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... inclined 倾向于，赞成的 disinclined 不愿的 chagrined 失望的，灰心的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... incline 倾斜；偏向 disinclined 不愿意的 proclivity 倾向；癖好.
SAT-填空题OG - 豆丁网 ... sarcasm 挖苦讽刺 disinclined 不愿的或勉强的 coerce 强制强迫.
DISPOSED倾向的，偏好的adj.disinclined不喜欢的JIBE 符合（嘲笑）v.

list.abs: They were usually disinclined to socialize ., 通常他们不愿参加社交.
Is disinclined to explain ., 是不愿作出解释.
That reflects a very British disinclination shell out on management training ., 这反映出英国人非常不喜欢花钱进行管理培训.
Well , iI feel rather disincline to talk about the accident ., 嗯 , 我觉得很不愿意谈这事故.

entry.def: If you are disinclined to do something, you do not want to do it.

example.ex: He was disinclined to talk about himself, especially to his students...
example.tran: 他不喜欢谈论他自己，尤其是当着他学生的面。

example.ex: They are disinclined to use violence because it is against their Buddhist faith.
example.tran: 他们不愿意使用暴力，因为这么做违背他们的佛教信仰。

means.word_mean: 1. unwilling because of mild dislike or disapproval;

auth_sentence.content: A...changeable temperament...disinclined him to stick to any course of life for long.
auth_sentence.res_content: A...changeable temperament...disinclined him to stick to any course of life for long.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A...changeable temperament...disinclined him to stick to any course of life for long.

auth_sentence.content: The decision is up to the district attorney, who appears disinclined to proceed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The decision is up to the district attorney, who appears disinclined to proceed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The decision is up to the district attorney, who appears disinclined to proceed.

auth_sentence.content: They were surprisingly allergic to indecorum, and disinclined to question the status quo.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were surprisingly allergic to indecorum, and disinclined to question the status quo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were surprisingly allergic to indecorum, and disinclined to question the status quo.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除
dis不+inclined[[adj.倾向于,赞成的]]不兜摹鷄dj.不愿意的
incline[v.倾斜;偏向]+ed……的→adj.倾向于,赞成的
clin床+ic医学有关→n.门诊部, 临床
decline[v.倾斜;衰退]+ation表名词→n.衰退;下倾
de向下+clin倾斜,斜坡+e→向下斜
in进入+clin倾斜,斜坡+e→进入斜→偏向,喜爱
re回+clin倾斜,斜坡+e→斜回去

Sentence.sentence: Older societies may be less innovative and more strongly disinclined to take risks than younger ones.

sentences.en: He gave me a disinclined assistance.
sentences.cn: 他很不情愿地给了我帮助。

sentences.en: He is disinclined to be photographed.
He was yoked to an disinclined partner.
sentences.cn: 他不得不与一位不情愿的伙伴合作。

sentences.en: A man like Luke had no need to force his attentions on disinclined women.
sentences.cn: 像卢克这样的男人没必要向不情愿的女人献殷勤。

sentences.en: He had a disinclined smile on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上带着一丝勉强的微笑。
